title: what the fck just happened
body: I was in a game today and all of a sudden everything in the game freezes and then my character start gliding and teleporting all over the screen. The enemies keep appearing and disappearing and the ping was around 100+.

replies.body:
I don't know if it is the patch or the Windows 10 OS, I'm experiencing the similar problem. Since Friday, my ping has become over 250+ ms. This happens randomly, sometimes the ping shows normal. Now I have to run a custom game bf I start a normal game, can't risk starting ranked.
My internet is working fine, web page, youtube and everything works fine, just LOL has this trouble.

> [{quoted}](name=The Original,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=F4A4fWta,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-08-02T13:43:13.326+0000)
>
> I don't know if it is the patch or the Windows 10 OS, I'm experiencing the similar problem. Since Friday, my ping has become over 250+ ms. This happens randomly, sometimes the ping shows normal. Now I have to run a custom game bf I start a normal game, can't risk starting ranked.
> My internet is working fine, web page, youtube and everything works fine, just LOL has this trouble.

Well i was playing a game yesterday midnight and there was no way someone else is awake at that time and my ping was 100 for most of the game but it suddenly spikes to 1000+ a few times in that game i played.  It could actually be rito's problem i'm not sure though.
There are other links and threads similair tothis but it is probably the bilge water event, once everything is back to normal itll be, well back to normal
Good to know im not the only one ...
Server's have been hiccupping since the new patch, wonder if riot has noticed
